DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting store sample tissue , blood , body fluid patient cancer study laboratory may help study cancer future . PURPOSE : This research study collect store blood tissue sample patient evaluated hematologic cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Tissue , Blood , Body Fluid Sample Collection From Patients With Hematologic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Provide source patient tissue , blood , body fluid sample ongoing diagnostic , prognostic , immune-monitoring study . - Support enhance translational , clinical basic research Lineberger Comprehensive Cancer Center ( LCCC ) member ( non-members LCCC member sponsor collaborator ) IRB-approved study . - Maintain responsible appropriate policy procedures ensure good patient care responsible conduct research . - Address medical legal issue , protect participant patient privacy confidentiality . - Provide responsible uniform mechanism integrate coordination hemato-pathologist surgeon hematology/oncology staff , researcher , protocol office obtain appropriate specimen researcher . - Support young investigator obtain pilot data grant funding . OUTLINE : Patients undergo tissue , blood , body fluid collection diagnostic routine procedure future correlative study . Tissue sample may include , limited , lymph node non-nodal biopsy , bone marrow biopsy and/or aspirate , blood serum , buccal swab germline DNA analysis .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis abnormal hematopoietic/lymphoid cancer , include follow : Acute myeloid leukemia Acute lymphoblastic leukemia Chronic myelogenous leukemia Chronic lymphoid leukemia NonHodgkin lymphoma Hodgkin lymphoma Myelodysplastic syndrome Myeloproliferative disorder Multiple myeloma Waldenstrom macroglobulinemia Aplastic anemia Any diseases generate abnormality either number , function , cell type hematolymphoid lineage Patients evaluate hematology/oncology clinic University North Carolina Hospitals , stem cell transplant clinic , hospital PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
